Reviews.Title: functionally exactly what I needed.
Reviews.Author: ShuMO
Reviews.Content: the cheapo home systems seem to always have 1 in 8 cables with a problem.  This solved that! worth the expense.

ProductInfo.Features:
Video power extension cable with power supply kit for CCTV security camera DVR system
1 of  50 feet video power cable in white
1 of 12V 500mA power supply with 6ft Long Cord 2.1mm Plug
Video power cable connector has BNC and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 50 Feet Video Power Security Camera Extension Cable with BNC RCA Adapters and 12V DC 500mA Power Supply for CCTV DVR Security System CFS
